QueryResult.text: SELECT count(countTab.user_id) users, l.lookup_code lic_right_type, l.name, l.language_code, l.description FROM (SELECT max(licence_priority) max_priority, user_id FROM cmn_lic_users_v GROUP BY user_id) countTab, cmn_lic_lookup_v l, cmn_sec_users u WHERE l.sort_order = countTab.max_priority AND u.id = countTab.user_id AND u.user_status_id = 200 GROUP BY l.lookup_code, l.name, l.language_code, l.description
